dct_description_sm: relative a un memoire de Mr. Guettard.
Map covers area of the headwaters of the rivers Seine, Marne, Oise and Meuse in France.
Latitudinal and longitudinal lines along margins.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Lieues communes de France de 25 au Deg√©."
Includes legend indicating mineral resources: Explication des caracteres.
"Mem de l'Ac. R. des Sc. 1754, page 494, pl. 18" at top right margin.
